item.title: Two arrested in Raichur's Manvi on charges of raping eight-year-old
item.description:
<![CDATA[Two arrested in Raichur's Manvi on charges of raping eight-year-old
The police arrested Shivanagouda for raping the minor, and Raju Talikoti, the owner of the school, on charges of negligence. The suspects were produced before a magistrate and taken into judicial custody....]]>
